helpModal.title: Help Center
helpModal.subtitle: Everything you need to know

login.title: How to log in?
login.description: To log in to Ligando, click the "Login" button at the top of the page. You can use your email and password, or sign in with Google.
login.step2: Enter your email and password, or use Google

register.title: Don't have an account?
register.description: Creating an account on Ligando is very easy. You just need an email address and follow a few simple steps.
register.step3: Complete the form and verify your email

about.title: What is Ligando?
about.description: Ligando is a video chat platform where you can connect with people from around the world. You can chat, make video calls and meet new people in a safe and fun way.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Registration is completely free. Some premium features may require coins.
faq.a2: You can start a video call with any online user. Calls are made in real time and are completely private.
faq.q3: Do I need to verify my account?
faq.a3: Yes, after registering you will receive a verification code in your email to activate your account.

helpModal.footer: Need more help? Contact our support team.

subtitulo: Video chat with random people instantly
welcomeMessage: Hello! {{name}} Ready for your next connection?
instructionText: Click the button below to start a random video call with a girl online, or call directly to any of the available girls.
tipMessage: Be authentic. The best connections come from a genuine smile.
girlsWillAppear: Available girls will appear here when they are online
youBlockedUser: You have blocked {{name}}. You must unblock her to call her.
userBlockedYou: {{name}} has blocked you. You cannot make calls to this girl.
favoritesWillAppear: When you add girls as favorites, they will appear here
blockedUsersWillAppear: Users you block from chat will appear here
blockTip: Blocked users cannot send you messages or call you. You can unblock them anytime.

settings.payoutAccountDescription: Configure the account where you will receive your work payments. This information will be used to make your earnings payouts.

errors.enterAccountHolderName: Please enter the account holder name

minimumPayoutModal.title: Configure Minimum Payout
minimumPayoutModal.description: Set the minimum amount to receive your payments. Earnings will accumulate until reaching this amount.
minimumPayoutModal.asMinimum: as minimum, you will only receive payments when your accumulated earnings reach this amount.
minimumPayoutModal.moreEarningsNeeded: This means you will need more earnings before receiving a payment.
minimumPayoutModal.moreFrequentPayments: This means you will receive payments more frequently.
minimumPayoutModal.payoutInfo: You will only receive payments when you reach this amount

errors.selectDifferentAmount: Select an amount different from the current one

settings.modalInstruction: Here you can implement the form or content for {{item}}.

googlePasswordSetup.title: Set Password
googlePasswordSetup.description: Since you registered with Google, you don't have a password set. We'll send you a link by email so you can set a password.
googlePasswordSetup.info: After setting your password, you'll be able to log in both with Google and with your email and password.
googlePasswordSetup.emailSentDescription: A link has been sent to {{email}}. Click the link in the email to set your password.
googlePasswordSetup.emailSentTip: The link will expire in 24 hours. If you don't receive the email, check your spam folder.

changePasswordModal.title: Change Password
changePasswordModal.verifyIdentity: To change your password, we need to verify your identity.
changePasswordModal.codeSentDescription: We have sent a 6-digit code to your email.
changePasswordModal.successMessage: Your password has been successfully updated.

errors.passwordMinLength: The new password must be at least 8 characters
errors.passwordsDontMatch: The new passwords do not match

deleteAccountModal.warningLoseAccess: You will lose access to all functions

deleteAccountModal.successMessage: Your account has been permanently deleted.

errors.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please log in again.

setupPassword.title: Set Password
setupPassword.description: Set a password for your account. You'll be able to log in both with Google and with your email and password.

setupPassword.canUseGoogle: You can continue using Google to log in
setupPassword.canUseEmail: Or use your email and password

notifications.title: Notification Settings
notifications.description: Customize which notifications you want to receive

favorites.label: Favorite Models Online
favorites.description: Be notified when your favorite models are online

privacy.title: Privacy Settings
privacy.description: Control who can contact you and manage your blocks
privacy.confirmUnblock: Are you sure you want to unblock this user?

blockedUsers.title: Blocked Users
blockedUsers.emptyDesc: Users you block will not be able to send you messages or contact you

info.title: Privacy Information
info.point1: Blocked users cannot send you messages or call you
info.point2: You can unblock users at any time
info.point3: If someone blocks you, you will not be able to contact them
info.point4: Blocks are private and the other user will not be notified

privacyFull.title: Privacy Settings
privacyFull.description: Control who can see you online, send private messages and view your profile.

favorites.title: Favorite Models
favorites.description: Manage your list of favorite models

favoritesFull.title: Favorite Models
favoritesFull.description: Manage your list of favorite models and receive notifications when they are online.

paymentMethods.title: Add or remove payment method
paymentMethods.description: Manage your payment methods to make purchases on the platform.

support.title: Support or Help
support.description: For questions, technical problems or help with your account, write to us at support@ligandome.com and our team will respond as soon as possible.

report.title: Report a problem
report.description: Tell us what problem you had. We will use this information to improve the platform.
report.describePlaceholder: Include as much detail as possible: what you were doing, on which screen, if you saw any error message, approximate time, etc.

subirHistoria.consejoAprobacion: Stories go through approval before being public. Videos cannot last more than 15 seconds.
subirHistoria.informacionRestriccion: You can only have one active story at a time. Each story lasts 24 hours from its approval.
subirHistoria.alerta_grabacion: Recording function in development or integrate getUserMedia to capture video.

waiting.message:
Thank you for registering.
We will notify you when you are verified.

approved.title: Verification approved!
approved.default_message: Your account has been successfully verified. You will be redirected in a few seconds...

rejected.title: Verification rejected
rejected.default_message: Your verification was rejected. Please try again with clearer documents.
rejected.redirect_message: You will be redirected to the verification process in 3 seconds...

stopverification.title: Identity Verification
stopverification.description: To get started, you must read our documentation and accept our terms.

modal.title: Terms and Conditions
modal.subtitle: Join our company
modal.paragraph1: By continuing with verification, you accept that the information provided is truthful and that the documents submitted are valid. We reserve the right to reject any suspicious or fraudulent verification attempt.
modal.paragraph2: Your data will be used solely to validate your identity for security purposes on the platform.
modal.paragraph3: By accepting these terms, you officially become part of our company with all the rights and responsibilities that this entails.
modal.checkboxLabel: I agree to become a company member and comply with all established policies
modal.checkboxRequired: You must accept to be part of the company to continue

selfieDoc.description: Your face next to the document

steps: Hold your identity document in front of the camera
Make sure there is good lighting
The document must be readable in the video
